attributes.action: Change the rule for £18 600 spouse visa
attributes.additional_details: Considering the current minimum wages even working full time will not allow certain people to ear £18.600 I totally agree that if you want to bring your spouse over you need to work and participate in the country develepment but take an example of a care assistant doing 50 hours a week you still cant ear that much why not allow working to bring there famillies instead of bringing more and more refugees
attributes.background: certain jobs with the current minimum wages it is impossible to earn £18 600 a week why not look at this decision again maybe drop the amount down and allow full time worker to live with there family
